I had to check the Grapefruit League stats of the guys vying for a roster Spot, the result: I was shocked. Remember, three guys are guaranteed to be on the roster: Mayberry, Wiggington, and Nix. And three guys are vying for one outfield/bench Spot: Podsednik, Pierre, and Montanez. I will give the stats for each group of three. Guess which three SUCK and which three should be on the openingday roster!

In case you didn't know... The top three stats belong to Podsednik, Pierre and Montanez, who have earned the right to be on the openingday roster. The last three belong to the Mendoza Brothers: John, Jr., Ty, and Laynce, who suck so bad, I'm at a lost to explain it. Unless a switch goes Off miraculously, I have a baaaaad feeling about this team's ability to score A run with those guys who are GUARANTEED to be on the roster.
